name: daemons
description: Projects - serialserver   - serial server receive RS232 and send via tcp     - serialport     - pkg     - logging - tcpserver   - tcp server - stream (keep client, connected and can reply to client, but need to take note on number of client connections)     - knex & mysql   - tcp server - event (close after receiving packet from client)     - knex & mysql - kafkaRx.js   - kafka consumer   - requires kafka to run (see /docker-devenv/kafka) - kafkaTx.js   - kafka producer   - requires kafka to run (see /docker-devenv/kafka)
